title: 随机指令
author: 中点P
txt_content: 求助大佬们如果想在某位置生成附加值为随机为0－6的混凝土怎么搞

replies.author: 中点P
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-8 12:20
所以什么版本呢？
基岩版...

replies.author: 葳蕤.葱茏
replies.txt_content:
中点P 发表于 2020-3-8 12:28
基岩版...
基岩版版本号是？？？

scoreboard objectives add random dummy
scoreboard players random @a random 0 6
execute @a[scores={random=0}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete
execute @a[scores={random=1}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 1
execute @a[scores={random=2}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 2
execute @a[scores={random=3}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 3
execute @a[scores={random=4}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 4
execute @a[scores={random=5}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 5
execute @a[scores={random=6}] ~~~ setblock <xyz> concrete 6
第一条代码只要输一次，剩下放到循环命令方块
